sentences.en: A And there will be new metro and transport systems.
sentences.cn: 还将有新的地铁和交通系统.

sentences.en: After failing a singing audition at the Metro-politan Opera, she turned to musical comedy.
sentences.cn: 在大都会歌剧院的试唱失败后，她转而投身歌舞喜剧。

sentences.en: B And there will be new metro lines and transport systems.
sentences.cn: 而且到时将有新的地铁线路和新的交通系统开始运行.

sentences.en: But what really sets Metro Bank apart is its state - of the - art It'system.
sentences.cn: 但是能让首都银行分开的是其最顶尖的信息技术系统.

sentences.en: Can you reach the park by metro?
sentences.cn: 你可以乘地铁到达那个公园 吗 ?

sentences.en: It’ll be quicker to go on the metro.
Its advertisement was all over in the Metro carriage.
sentences.cn: 因为满地铁的车厢里都是它的广告.

sentences.en: Johnny : You really wanna help me in the Metro Organization?
sentences.cn: 你真的想插手帮忙地下组织?

sentences.en: So far, Harbin Aijian Metro project trust problem has remained unsolved.
sentences.cn: 至今, 爱建信托哈尔滨新城项目的问题仍未能解决.

sentences.en: The full project about measuring the stability of metro bogie was presented.
sentences.cn: 给出了测试地铁转向架平稳度的完整方案.

sentences.en: The metro is efficient and spotlessly clean.
sentences.cn: 地铁非常快捷，而且一尘不染。

sentences.en: The Metro journey back to the centre of the town was hot and uncomfortable.
sentences.cn: 乘地铁返回市中心又热又不舒服。

sentences.en: The new Metro is designed to run on unleaded fuel.
sentences.cn: 新的地铁系统设计为使用无铅燃料。

sentences.en: The northern extension of Metro Line 3 began operating last Monday.
sentences.cn: 轨道交通3号线的北延伸段已于本周一投入营运.

sentences.en: Wheel wear is a concern on most metro systems.
sentences.cn: 对大部分地铁系统来说车轮磨损事关重大.

sentences.en: When travelling at bus or metro, please hold the handrail.
sentences.cn: 坐公交或地铁时, 请抓紧扶手.

words.tran_cn: 地铁；大都市；伦敦地下铁道；麦德隆（财富500强公司之一，总部所在地德国，主要经营零售）

trans.tran_en: a railway system that runs under the ground below a city
